channel.title: All Articles by Richard Scott on FileNUX on FileNUX
channel.description: Recent content in All Articles by Richard Scott on FileNUX on FileNUX

item.title: STOPzilla AntiMalware
item.description: STOPzilla AntiMalware is a security software program designed to protect computer systems from malware, viruses, and other malicious software.

item.title: SpywareBlaster
item.description: SpywareBlaster is a powerful and effective tool for protecting your computer from the malicious intent of spyware, adware, and other unwanted programs.

item.title: SpyShelter Premium Anti-Keylogger
item.description: SpyShelter Premium Anti-Keylogger is a digital fortress for your computer, providing an impenetrable barrier against the ever-evolving threat of keyloggers and other malicious software.

item.title: Spybot Search & Destroy
item.description: Spybot Search & Destroy is a powerful and popular anti-spyware program that can help protect your computer from a wide range of malicious software, including spyware, adware, trojans, and more.

item.title: RogueKiller Portable
item.description: RogueKiller AntiMalware is a powerful and portable tool designed to detect and remove malware from your computer.

item.title: Reason Core Security
item.description: Reason Core Security is a cutting-edge solution for protecting your computer from adware and potentially unwanted programs (PUPs).

item.title: Panda Cloud Cleaner
item.description: Panda Cloud Cleaner is a cloud-based malware detection and removal tool developed by Panda Security.

item.title: Norton Power Eraser
item.description: The Norton Power Eraser is a tool developed to remove malware and other unwanted software from a computer.

item.title: Malwarebytes Anti-Exploit
item.description: Malwarebytes Anti-Exploit is a powerful security software that offers protection against various types of exploit attacks on popular browsers.

item.title: KeyScrambler Professional
item.description: KeyScrambler is a software program that aims to protect users from keylogging malware by encrypting keystrokes at the kernel level.

item.title: F-Secure Online Scanner
item.description: F-Secure Online Scanner is a free tool designed to scan your computer for viruses, malware, and other online threats and to remove any malicious software that is found.

item.title: Comodo Cleaning Essentials
item.description: Comodo Cleaning Essentials is a comprehensive security software that allows users to identify and remove malware, rootkits, and other harmful processes from their Windows computers.

item.title: Yandex Browser
item.description: Yandex Browser is a freeware web browser developed by the Russian tech company Yandex.

item.title: Whale Browser
item.description: Whale Browser is a web browser that is designed to be fast, reliable, and customizable.

item.title: Waterfox Classic
item.description: Waterfox is an open-source web browser for Windows, macOS, and Linux, based on the Mozilla Firefox codebase.

item.title: Viasat Browser
item.description: The Viasat Browser is a lightweight, fast, and secure web browser that has been optimized for use on Viasat’s satellite internet network.

item.title: SRWare Iron Portable
item.description: SRWare Iron is a web browser that focuses on security and privacy.

item.title: Slimjet Portable
item.description: Slimjet is a fast and powerful web browser that is designed to enhance your browsing experience.

item.title: Slimjet
item.description: Slimjet is a web browser that has been designed to provide users with a fast, efficient, and secure browsing experience.

item.title: Tor Browser
item.description: Tor is a free, open-source web browser that is designed to protect users’ privacy and anonymity.

item.title: Sleipnir Browser
item.description: Sleipnir is a web browser developed by Fenrir & Co., a Japanese software company.

item.title: Sidekick
item.description: Sidekick Browser is a browser that is specifically designed for use in a professional setting, where users may need to access a wide range of web tools and collaborate with their team.

item.title: iTop Private Browser
item.description: iTop Private Browser is a browser that provides users with the ability to surf the web privately and securely.

item.title: Firefox Developer Edition
item.description: Firefox Developer Edition is a specialized version of the popular Firefox web browser, designed specifically for web developers.

item.title: Comodo IceDragon
item.description: Comodo IceDragon is a web browser based on Mozilla Firefox that is developed and maintained by Comodo, a cybersecurity and internet security company.

item.title: HijackThis
item.description: HijackThis is a free tool that can be used to detect and remove malware from a computer.

item.title: Ghost Browser
item.description: Ghost Browser is a privacy-focused web browser that allows users to compartmentalize their online activities and keep their personal and professional lives separate.

item.title: CLIQZ
item.description: CLIQZ is a web browser based on the open-source Mozilla Firefox browser and includes additional features that are designed to enhance privacy and security for the user.

item.title: CLIQZ
item.description: CLIQZ is a web browser that was developed by CLIQZ GmbH, a German software company.

item.title: Chromium
item.description: Chromium is an open-source web browser that serves as a base for Google Chrome, which is a proprietary web browser developed and maintained by Google.

item.title: Chromium
item.description: Chromium is an open-source web browser project developed by Google. It is the basis for the popular Google Chrome web browser, as well as many other web browsers that are based on Chromium.

item.title: Cent Browser
item.description: Cent Browser is a Chromium-based browser, which means that it is built on the open-source Chromium project and shares a lot of its underlying technology with Google Chrome.

item.title: CCleaner Browser
item.description: CCleaner Browser is a web browser developed by Piriform, a company acquired by Avast in 2017.

item.title: Avast Secure Browser
item.description: Avast Secure Browser is a privacy-focused web browser developed by the Czech cybersecurity company Avast.

item.title: Brave Browser
item.description: Brave is a free and open-source web browser developed by Brave Software, Inc.

item.title: AdwCleaner
item.description: AdwCleaner is a software developed to help users remove adware, potentially unwanted programs (PUPs), and other malicious or unwanted software from their computers.
